turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need a little pick-me-up. Can I order a cafe mocha from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a a tall with.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall mocha, with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At a 4th Street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 4th st.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat my order, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a tall mocha, with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add a a dash of cinnamon on top of the whipped cream, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, adding cinnamon to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And Thank you. And how much is that going to cost?
